edu.illinois.mitra.starl.objects

Class Common

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.objects.Common

  • public final class Common
extends java.lang.Object
    The static Common class is used to store StarL constants used for messaging, event handling, and GUI updates. A series of useful functions are included as well.
